name: Jira Ticket Sync
description:
Jira Ticket Sync allows agile design teams to bridge the gap between Jira and Figma. Add your Jira tickets directly in Figma and create links to your designs. Make changes in Jira and sync the changes in Figma. This helps you to keep track of your design progress in Figma and connects Jira tickets directly with your designs.


Jira Ticket Sync is not affiliated with Jira or Figma.

It's simply developed with 💙 by Lukas Bittner.


Demo Video


Features

  1. Add Jira tickets as “Jira Ticket Headers” to Figma.
  2. Create links in the Jira tickets that reference the “Jira Ticket Headers”.
  3. Automatically update all “Jira Ticket Headers” if you have made changes to the Jira tickets (e.g the status changed).
  4. Customise the design of your "Jira Ticket Headers".
  5. Adjust & customise status variants to your Jira board.
